onset.Description: Time of the event onset, in seconds, with respect to the beginning of the recording.

duration.Description: Duration of the event, in seconds.

trial_type.Description: Type of the trial (e.g., stimulus category, condition label).

sample.Description: Sample number in the raw data at which the event occurs.

value.Description: Event trigger value as found in the stimulus channel.

StimulusPresentation.PresentationDevice: LCD screen, 60 Hz, viewed at 50 cm
StimulusPresentation.AuditoryPresentation: Stax SRM 700 and ear speakers SR003
